sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'
import * as d3 from 'd3'

const PieChart = () => {
  useEffect(() => {
    const data = {
      name: 'Top',
      children: [
        {
          name: 'Group A',
          children: [
            { name: 'A1', value: 100 },
            { name: 'A2', value: 200 },
            { name: 'A3', value: 300 },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Group B',
          children: [
            { name: 'B1', value: 150 },
            { name: 'B2', value: 250 },
          ],
        },
      ],
    }

    const width = 500
    const height = 500
    const radius = Math.min(width, height) / 2

    const color = d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory10)

    const arc = d3
      .arc()
      .outerRadius(radius - 10)
      .innerRadius(0)

    const labelArc = d3
      .arc()
      .outerRadius(radius - 40)
      .innerRadius(radius - 40)

    const pie = d3
      .pie()
      .sort(null)
      .value((d) => d.value)

    const svg = d3
      .select('#chartContainer')
      .append('svg')
      .attr('width', width)
      .attr('height', height)
      .append('g')
      .attr('transform', `translate(${width / 2},${height / 2})`)

    const g = svg
      .selectAll('.arc')
      .data(pie(data.children))
      .enter()
      .append('g')
      .attr('class', 'arc')

    g.append('path')
      .attr('d', arc)
      .style('fill', (d) => color(d.data.name))

    g.append('text')
      .attr('transform', (d) => `translate(${labelArc.centroid(d)})`)
      .attr('dy', '.35em')
      .text((d) => d.data.name)
  }, [])

  return <div id="chartContainer" />
}

export default PieChart
